Cell.Data: This contains original text meant for subtitles. This text exists for a multi-lingual reference and is not used in-game. Use ## for a new line.
Contains translated text for subtitles. Typically, Original Text is the English version of the Key for reference, while the Translated Text will be what's actually used in-game.
Nobody knows what started the Final War. It was over too fast, fought with the last of the belligerent nations nuclear stockpiles, and the ones who pulled the triggers didn't survive.

ss:Data.Font: 没有人知道最终战争的开始。它很快过去了，与最后的核武器交战国进行了斗争，而那些触发战争的人并没有幸存下来。

Cell.Data: Half a century of wars using nukes, bio-weapons, nano-weapons, and even kinetic-kill weapons, gave us the empty world - a population of 100 million and falling fast.

ss:Data.Font: 半个世纪的战争使用核武器，生物武器，纳米武器，甚至是动能杀戮武器，给了我们一个空虚的世界 - 一个1亿人口并且快速下降。

Cell.Data: It was the Final War because after that there was really nobody left who wanted to fight; we were all too busy surviving.

ss:Data.Font: 这是最后的战争，因为在那之后真的没有人想要战斗
我们都忙于活着。

Cell.Data: Who's to blame? Depends on who you are, but you could just as easily blame the weapons industry; by the end, virtually every arms dealer in the world was owned by Amalgamated Corporation.

ss:Data.Font: 该怪谁？取决于你是谁，但你也可以轻而易举地指责武器工业；到最后，世界上几乎所有的武器经销商都被联合公司所拥有。

Cell.Data: Hell, in the end, the Amalgamated Corporation made just about everything. AC Sportsdrinks, AC Icecream, AC Battlegear, even AC Happytabs. I miss those. AC even gave us our wonderful mutant problem.

ss:Data.Font: 见鬼，最终，合并后的公司几乎什么都做了。
AC
运动饮料，冰淇淋，战斗装备，甚至玩物。我怀念那些。
AC
甚至给了我们奇妙的变异问题

Cell.Data: All the weapons-grade isotopes getting into the water table, or the fish, or the air reacted with some of the leftover bio-weapons and made lots of people go as squirrely as tab-pumped cannibals.

ss:Data.Font: 所有进入地下水位制造核武器的设备，或鱼，或空气，都会与一些剩余的生物武器发生反应，让很多人像吃人肉的老虎一样感到不安。

Cell.Data: You can ignore a neighbor developing neo-elephantitis or novuleprosy, but when he tries to eat you, you've got to take an interest.

ss:Data.Font: 你可以忽略一个正在发生皮病或麻风病的邻居，但当他试图吃掉你时，你必须引起警惕。

Cell.Data: So that's it, we're done, civilization is taking a breather. In 2089, anyone left alive and unmutated is just focused on staying that way.

ss:Data.Font: 就这样，我们做完了，文明正在休息。在
年，任何活着且未发生突变的生物都只专注于保持这种状态。

Cell.Data: There are stories of enclaves here and there, where they're lucky enough to have plenty of food stockpiled and mutants are thin on the ground or there's lots of ammunition to throw at them. My advice is to find one, or make one.

ss:Data.Font: 这里和那里都有孤独幸存者的故事，他们很幸运地有足够的食物储存，地面上的突变体很薄或有很多弹药可以扔到他们身上。我的建议是找一个，或做一个。

Cell.Data: The Earth abides, all this too shall pass away, and if Darwin blesses you then your kids will inherit what's left. For now, it's one day at a time.

ss:Data.Font: 地球将继续存在，这一切也将过去，如果达尔文祝福你，那么你的孩子将继承剩下的东西。现在，一天一次。

Cell.Data: In case you are bleeding, quickly tear old clothes into rags by right-clicking on them and selecting 'tear into rags'.

ss:Data.Font: 如果您正在流血，请通过右键单击它们并选择“撕成碎布”，将旧衣服快速撕成碎布。

Cell.Data: You need to craft and place a Plot Sign to claim land before you can start constructing your base. Plot signs cannot be destroyed until all other base parts are first destroyed.

ss:Data.Font: 在开始建立基地之前，您需要制作并放置一个领地牌来代表你的领地。在所有建筑物拆掉之前，不能销毁这块领地牌。

Cell.Data: The Iron Sons left us crafting guides, you can learn their contents by finding and reading them.\nBe sure to keep an eye out for them or trade them with other survivors.

ss:Data.Font: 工匠留给我们制作指南，你可以通过查找和阅读它们来学习它们的内容。一定要留意它们或与其他幸存者交易。

Cell.Data: If you happen to run out of ammo, you can melee attack with any weapon using %[player:special].

ss:Data.Font: 如果你碰巧用完了弹药，你可以用任何使用％[player：special]的武器进行近战攻击。

Cell.Data: No weapons on hand? Try kicking %[player:special2] instead of punching, for greater range and a more powerful attack!

ss:Data.Font: 手头没有武器？尝试踢％[player：special2]而不是打击，以获得更大范围和更强大的攻击！

Cell.Data: There is no shortage of wood in what is left of the world.\nStrike your Hatchet against trees to gather logs, which can then be refined into Lumber.

ss:Data.Font: 在世界上剩下的东西中不乏木材。打你的斧头对着树木收集原木，然后可以精炼成木材。

Cell.Data: Stones can be gathered from rocks with a Pickaxe. You can also use it to pick open skulls!

ss:Data.Font: 用镐可以从岩石中收集石头。你也可以用它敲碎别人的脑袋！

Cell.Data: Broken down cars make for a good source of scrap metal out in the wasteland, if you've got a Hammer on hand.

ss:Data.Font: 如果你手头有一把锤子，那么破碎的汽车可以在荒地上找到一块好的废金属来源。

Cell.Data: Group up with other survivors to start a clan. Clan members share each other's bases and can build together.

ss:Data.Font: 与其他幸存者一起组建一个小组。小组成员分享彼此的基地并可以共同建立。

Cell.Data: You can only place one base building Plot Sign on each server.

ss:Data.Font: 您只能在每台服务器上放置一个领地牌。

Cell.Data: 'My home is my castle'. In order to keep it this way each base has to be at some distance from others.

ss:Data.Font: “我的家就是我的城堡”。为了保持这种方式，每个基地必须与其他基地保持一定距离。

Cell.Data: When placing a base part, hold down %[player:allow_rotate] and move the mouse to rotate the object.

ss:Data.Font: 放置基地部件时，按住
[player
alt
并移动鼠标以旋转对象。

Cell.Data: When placing a base part, you can constrain the item to your elevation by holding Left Shift.

ss:Data.Font: 放置基地零件时，可以通过按住
左移
将项目约束到高程。

Cell.Data: When placing a base part, right clicking the mouse cancels its placement.

ss:Data.Font: 放置基地部件时，右键单击鼠标会取消其放置位置。

Cell.Data: When placing a base part, move your survivor around to change the part's position and orientation.

ss:Data.Font: 放置基地部件时，移动幸存者以更改部件的位置和方向。

Cell.Data: You can only place base parts on your own land, or a clan member's land.

ss:Data.Font: 您只能在自己的领地或小组成员的土地上放置基础部件。

Cell.Data: The more parts your base consists of, the longer your base will survive unattended. Interact with your base to keep it alive!

ss:Data.Font: 您的基地所包含的部分越多，您的基地在无人看管的情况下存活的时间就越长。与您的基地互动以保持活力！

Cell.Data: Type !base in chat to obtain information about your current base, how many parts it has and life time remaining.

ss:Data.Font: 在聊天中键入！base以获取有关当前基础的信息，它拥有的部件数量和剩余使用寿命。

Cell.Data: Scavenge thoroughly! The few resources left in this world can be found in the most unlikely of places.

ss:Data.Font: 彻底清扫！世界上仅存的少数资源可以在最不可能的地方找到。

Cell.Data: Running through the wasteland makes you thirsty. Containers can be refilled by looking at a water source and using the action menu.

ss:Data.Font: 穿过荒地会让你口渴。通过查看水源并使用操作菜单，可以重新灌水。

Cell.Data: The few generators left in the world can be powered up with the right resources.\nCheck the inventory on it to see what it needs.

ss:Data.Font: 世界上剩下的少数发电机可以使用合适的资源启动。检查它上面的库存以查看它需要什么。

Cell.Data: Your survivor can carry up to 40kg. Backpacks and clothes have pockets to carry more items.\nKeep an eye on your gear's weight in the inventory screen.

ss:Data.Font: 你的幸存者最多可携带
公斤。背包和衣服有口袋可以携带更多物品。请在背包屏幕上注意您的装备重量。

Cell.Data: You can repair vehicles by hitting it with the Lug Wrench weapon.

ss:Data.Font: 你可以用扳手修理汽车。

Cell.Data: Vehicles are great for storing heavy stuff, but don't let someone else drive off with it!

ss:Data.Font: 车辆很适合存放重物，但不要让别人把它开走

Cell.Data: Vehicles require several resources in order to be started. Check the vehicle's inventory to see what it needs.

ss:Data.Font: 车辆需要多种资源才能启动。检查车辆的库存，看看它需要什么。

Cell.Data: Vehicles can drive with no wheels, but they handle poorly and are slow.

ss:Data.Font: 汽车没有轮子也能行驶，但它们的操控性很差，速度也很慢。

Cell.Data: Weapon feels inaccurate? Press and hold %[player:stabilize] to hold your breath and reduce sway.

ss:Data.Font: 瞄准感觉不准确？按住％
[player
stabilize]
以屏住呼吸并减少摇摆。

Cell.Data: While Mutants may lack in ranged attacks, they are very powerful up-close. Try to stay away from them if you can.

ss:Data.Font: 虽然突变体可能缺乏远程攻击，但它们在近距离攻击时非常强大。如果可能的话，尽量远离他们。

Cell.Data: Shoes give you some protection against punji stick traps, but it is best to avoid them all together.

ss:Data.Font: 鞋子能给你提供一些保护，使你免受旁遮普木棍陷阱的伤害，但最好同时避开它们。

Cell.Data: Be aware of your surroundings! Hiding in bushes and other foliage can be a useful tactic.

ss:Data.Font: 注意你的周围环境！躲在灌木丛和其他树叶中可能是一种有用的策略。

Cell.Data: Shooting from the hip is significantly less accurate than using your iron sights.

ss:Data.Font: 蹲下射击比使用机喵要精确得多

Cell.Data: All projectiles are affected by gravity. Make sure to lead your shots if you engage in long range combat.

ss:Data.Font: 所有射击都受到重力的影响。如果你参与远程作战，请务必引导你的射击镜头。

Cell.Data: You can create a clan through the clan tab in your inventory.

ss:Data.Font: 您可以通过菜单栏中的部落选项卡创建一个部落。

Cell.Data: Crouching with %[player:crouch] makes you quieter, a harder target to hit, and also increases your accuracy.

ss:Data.Font: 使用％[player：crouch]进行蹲伏会让你更安静，更难以击中目标，并且还可以提高你的准确度。

Cell.Data: Proning with %[player:prone] lowers your profile a lot making you a harder target to hit, and also increasing your accuracy.

ss:Data.Font: 使用％
[player
prone]
进行翻译会降低您的准确性，使您更难以击中目标，并提高您的准确率。

Cell.Data: During prone %[player:prone] or %[player:crouch] you can modify your speed and loudness by using the sprint %[player:sprint] or walk %[player:walk] bindings.

ss:Data.Font: 在俯卧％[player：prone]或％[player：crouch]期间，你可以使用sprint％[player：sprint]或walk％[player：walk]绑定来修改你的速度和响度。

Cell.Data: During prone %[player:prone] you can perform fast side-rolls by combining it with sprint %[player:sprint] and %[player:moveleft] or %[player:moveright].

ss:Data.Font: 在俯卧％[player：prone]期间，您可以通过将其与sprint％[player：sprint]和％[player：moveleft]或％[player：moveright]相结合来执行快速侧滚动。

Cell.Data: A 'shoot first, ask questions later' policy might not always be the best option. Use your voice %[default:voice_chat_talk] to talk and group up with other survivors.

ss:Data.Font: 先开枪，后提问
的政策可能并不总是最好的选择使用您的语音％
[default
voice_chat_talk]
与其他幸存者进行交谈和分组。

Cell.Data: Double-tapping the voice key %[default:voice_chat_talk] will change your voice mode. The two available modes are push-to-talk and voice-activated.

ss:Data.Font: 双击语音键％[default：voice_chat_talk]将改变您的语音模式。两种可用模式是按键通话和语音激活。

Cell.Data: Speak to other survivors using %[default:voice_chat_talk] to determine if they are friendly or hostile.

ss:Data.Font: 使用％[default：voice_chat_talk]与其他幸存者交谈以确定他们是友好还是敌对。

Cell.Data: You can switch which shoulder the camera is over by pressing %[player:switchshoulder].

ss:Data.Font: 您可以按％[player：switchshoulder]切换相机所在的肩膀。

Cell.Data: You can walk slowly and make less noise when moving around by using %[player:walk].

ss:Data.Font: 使用％[player：walk]时，你可以慢慢行走并减少噪音。

Cell.Data: A full list of available actions can be found in the Controls menu. You can also rebind actions from this menu.

ss:Data.Font: 可以在
键位
菜单中找到可用操作的完整列表。您还可以从此菜单重新绑定操作。

Cell.Data: When being idle too long, or waiting to long to respawn, you will be automatically kicked from the server.\nIt's wise to sign out in areas that are less hostile.

ss:Data.Font: 当空闲时间太长或等待很长时间重新开始时，您将自动从服务器中被踢出。明智的做法是在敌意较小的区域退出。

Cell.Data: Remember to carry a torch or flashlight with you at night, or when entering dark areas.

ss:Data.Font: 请记住在晚上或进入黑暗区域时随身携带手电筒或手电筒。

Cell.Data: Count the bullets as you fire and check the magazine in the inventory to avoid running out of bullets during a firefight.

ss:Data.Font: 当你开火的时候数数子弹，检查背包中的弹匣，以避免在交火时子弹用完。

Cell.Data: If you hear another survivor nearby, stay still and observe them to determine how best to proceed.

ss:Data.Font: 如果你听到附近有另一个幸存者，保持安静并观察他们，以确定如何最好地继续。

Cell.Data: Find cover in a firefight. Being out in the open is asking for trouble.

ss:Data.Font: 在交火中寻找掩护。在户外是自找麻烦。

Cell.Data: Sticking to the roads can be dangerous. It may be wise to find another route.

ss:Data.Font: 坚持道路可能是危险的。找到另一条路线可能是明智之举。

Cell.Data: The 5-ton truck can carry up to 10 people, but if you need to transport the entire clan across town in style, load up to 29 survivors in the party bus!

ss:Data.Font: 这辆
吨重的卡车最多可搭载
人，但如果您需要将一个队伍运送到整个城镇，那么在公交车上装载多达
名幸存者！

Cell.Data: Radiation areas are detectable with geiger counter or noticeable by a slightly blue glow. Stock up on anti-rad pills, anti-rad mushrooms or potassium-iodine pills before entering known radiation areas.

ss:Data.Font: 辐射区域可通过盖革计数器检测到，或通过略微蓝色的光线可察觉。在进入已知辐射区域之前，先购买抗辐射药丸，抗辐射蘑菇或碘 - 钾药片。

Cell.Data: Sometimes your best option to get out of trouble is to jump off a bridge and dive under water.

ss:Data.Font: 有时，摆脱困境的最佳选择是跳下桥并在水下潜水。

Cell.Data: Being well fed and hydrated will allow you to recover faster from wounds.

ss:Data.Font: 充足的水分和水分将使您从伤口恢复得更快。

Cell.Data: Team up with a group or clan to increase your chance of survival. Remember what your friends are wearing and call out if you change appearance to avoid accidental friendly fire.

ss:Data.Font: 与团队或部落合作以增加您的生存机会。记住你的朋友穿着什么，如果改变外表以避免意外友好的火灾，请打电话。

Cell.Data: If you hear a mutant or survivor, chances are they're coming for you, so watch your back!\nYou can also freelook using %[player:allow_rotate].

ss:Data.Font: 如果你听到一个突变体或幸存者，很可能他们会为你而来，所以注意你的背部！你也可以使用％[player：allow_rotate]来解决问题。

Cell.Data: Vehicles can be shot and will explode when damaged enough.

ss:Data.Font: 车辆可以被射击并且在足够损坏时会爆炸。

Cell.Data: Objects filled with explosives, propane, fuel or fire extinguishers will explode when destroyed.\nThis also applies to your inventory if your equipment is shot at.

ss:Data.Font: 装有爆炸物、煤气、燃料或灭火器的物体在被摧毁时会爆炸。如果您的物品被射击，这也适用于您的库存。

Cell.Data: Wind will affect your bullet path. The path change will increase with distance, as will bullet drop.

ss:Data.Font: 风会影响你的子弹路径。路径的改变会随着距离的增加而增加，子弹也会下落。

Cell.Data: You can craft improved bandages by combining rubbing alcohol and a bandage.

ss:Data.Font: 您可以通过结合酒精和绷带来制作改良的绷带。

Cell.Data: Medic 101: Antibiotics cure poison. Anti-rad pills decrease radiation. Bandages or rags decrease bleeding.

ss:Data.Font: Medic 101：抗生素治疗毒药。抗辐射药丸减少辐射。绷带或抹布减少出血。

Cell.Data: You can join a friend's gameplay session quickly through the Steam friends list.

ss:Data.Font: 您可以通过Steam好友列表快速加入好友的游戏会话。

Cell.Data: You can directly join a gameplay session through the Steam server browser (View > Servers).

ss:Data.Font: 您可以通过Steam服务器浏览器（“查看”>“服务器”）直接加入游戏会话。

Cell.Data: Hover the mouse cursor over items in your inventory for a more detailed description of the item.

ss:Data.Font: 将鼠标指针悬停在背包中的物品上，以获得该物品的更详细描述。

Cell.Data: If you encounter a survivor threatening you with a weapon, check to see if they even have a magazine in it.\nThey might be bluffing!

ss:Data.Font: 如果遇到幸存者用武器威胁你，请检查他们是否有子弹。他们可能是虚张声势！

Cell.Data: Other survivors can see light at night from a great distance. Be careful or your flashlight might give away your position.

ss:Data.Font: 其他幸存者可以在远处看到夜晚的光线。小心，否则你的手电筒可能会暴露你的位置。

Cell.Data: Run into the direction you want to jump. The momentum will increase your jump distance.

ss:Data.Font: 跑向你想跳的方向。冲力会增加你的跳跃距离。

Cell.Data: Some backpacks have more space than others. Keep on the lookout for improved versions of items you already own.

ss:Data.Font: 有些背包比其他背包有更多的空间。继续关注您已经拥有的项目的改进版本。

Cell.Data: Holstering your weapon will make you appear less threatening to other survivors.

ss:Data.Font: 把你的武器藏起来会使你看起来对其他幸存者的威胁更小

Cell.Data: Some mushrooms can be eaten, and others can be used as a crafting ingredient.

ss:Data.Font: 有些蘑菇可以食用，其他蘑菇可以作为手工制作成分。

Cell.Data: Some melee weapons have an increased chance to make your foe bleed.

ss:Data.Font: 一些近战武器有更大的机会让你的敌人流血。

Cell.Data: If you are lost, look for roads, rivers, landmarks or power lines, they will likely lead you to somewhere of interest.

ss:Data.Font: 如果您迷路，寻找道路，河流，地标或电力线，它们可能会引导您前往感兴趣的地方。

Cell.Data: Besides voice communication, there are 3 different text chat modes (all with different ranges): whisper, local, and area.

ss:Data.Font: 除语音通信外，还有
种不同的文本聊天模式（均具有不同的范围）：私密，本地和区域。

Cell.Data: You can sit down by using %[player:sit] when you are not holding an item.

ss:Data.Font: 当你没有拿着物品时，可以使用％[player：sit]坐下来。

Cell.Data: Look for a bus stop if you get lost. Bus stops have maps on them to help you get your bearings.

ss:Data.Font: 如果你迷路了，找一个公共汽车站。公共汽车站上有地图帮助你找到方向

Cell.Data: There are some maps of the local area on signs placed throughout the world.

ss:Data.Font: 在世界各地的标志上都有一些当地的地图。

Cell.Data: Keep an eye out for hand-held maps of Orca Island, scattered throughout the world.

ss:Data.Font: 留意遍布世界各地的奥卡岛手持地图。

Cell.Data: Raise your weapon or fists by using %[player:tactical], this will slow you down while running, but not while sprinting.

ss:Data.Font: 使用％[player：tactical]来提升你的武器或拳头，这会让你在跑步时减速，但在短跑时不会。

Cell.Data: Quickly go to ironsight when your weapon isn't raised yet by using a single tap to %[player:attack1] followed by %[player:zoom].

ss:Data.Font: 当你还没有拿起武器时，单机左键快速进入瞄准镜。％
[player
attack1]
然后％
[player
zoom]
快速进入
ironsight

Cell.Data: You can focus zoom at any time, with any item in hand, by using %[player:zoom].

ss:Data.Font: 通过使用％[player：zoom]，您可以随时使用任何项目对焦变焦。

Cell.Data: You can surrender to survivors by using %[default:emotep_handsup] and putting your weapon away.

ss:Data.Font: 你可以使用％[default：emotep_handsup]并放下你的武器向幸存者投降。

Cell.Data: Greet other survivors by waving using %[default:emote_wave].

ss:Data.Font: 通过挥动使用％[default：emote_wave]来招呼其他幸存者。

Cell.Data: Warn other survivors to approach by indicating to them to stop using %[default:emote_stop].

ss:Data.Font: 通过指示他们停止使用％[default：emote_stop]来警告其他幸存者。

Cell.Data: Invite survivors to approach by using %[default:emote_comehere].

ss:Data.Font: 通过使用％[default：emote_comehere]邀请幸存者接近。

Cell.Data: Warn survivors to be silent by using %[default:emote_shhh].

ss:Data.Font: 使用％
[default
emote_shhh]
警告幸存者保持安静。

Cell.Data: Give other survivors directions by using %[default:emote_pointfinger].

ss:Data.Font: 使用％[default：emote_pointfinger]为其他幸存者指示。

Cell.Data: Increase the range of bows and throwing items by holding %[player:attack1] for about a second before releasing.

ss:Data.Font: 在释放之前，通过持有％[player：attack1]约一秒来增加弓箭和投掷物品的范围。

Cell.Data: You can craft arrows and bolts with various effects (e.g. Fire or Poison).\nMost of these effects can only be used once per projectile.

ss:Data.Font: 您可以制作具有各种效果的箭头和螺栓（例如火焰或毒药）。这些效果中的大多数只能在每个射弹上使用一次。

Cell.Data: Rest up and give your wounds time to heal. Sitting down %[player:sit] will heal your wounds faster.

ss:Data.Font: 休息，让你的伤口有时间愈合。坐下％[player：sit]会更快地治愈你的伤口。

Cell.Data: You can reload by using %[player:reload] if you have ammo in your pockets (not your backpack).\nOr by dragging the ammo into your weapon through the inventory %[default:ui_show_inventory].

ss:Data.Font: 如果你的口袋里有弹药（不是你的背包），你可以使用％
[player
reload]
重新加载。或者通过背包％
[default
ui_show_inventory]
将弹药拖入你的武器。

Cell.Data: You can look into an object's inventory by using %[default:ui_show_inventory] while looking at it.

ss:Data.Font: 您可以在查看对象的背包时使用％
[default
ui_show_inventory]
查看对象的背包。

Cell.Data: Other survivors can be captured by using duct-tape on them from behind while they aren't moving.

ss:Data.Font: 其他幸存者可以通过在他们不移动时从后面使用胶带来捕获。

Cell.Data: When you have been captured you can try to break free by alternating between %[player:leanleft] and %[player:leanright] for about 5 minutes. Or by getting a friendly survivor to free you.

ss:Data.Font: 当你被抓到的时候，你可以试着在％
[player
leanleft]
和％
[player
leanright]
之间交替约
分钟来挣脱。或者通过让友好的幸存者释放你。

Cell.Data: When your inventory is full you can still directly consume items in the world by using %[player:mwheel_down].

ss:Data.Font: 当您的背包已满时，您仍然可以使用％
[player
mwheel_down]
直接使用世界中的商品。

Cell.Data: Some weapons have multiple fire modes. Press %[player:firemode] to switch between these modes.

ss:Data.Font: 有些武器有多种射击模式。按％[player：firemode]可在这些模式之间切换。

Cell.Data: Learned guides will only be valid for the server they were learned on. They are still kept after death and restarts.

ss:Data.Font: 学习的指南仅对他们学习的服务器有效。他们仍然在死后重新开始。

Cell.Data: Learned guides will expose new craftable items that were otherwise unknown to your survivor. There may be more items you can craft which you don't yet know about!

ss:Data.Font: 学到的指南向幸存者提供不知道的新的可制作物品。您可以制作更多您还不知道的物品！

Cell.Data: Think you're king of the mountain standing on top of that car? Think again! Mutants can throw rocks at survivors they can see but can't reach!

ss:Data.Font: 认为你是站在那辆车顶上的王？再想想！突变体可以向他们可以看到但无法到达的幸存者扔石头！

Cell.Data: You can turn vehicle lights on and off with %[vehicle_driver:v_lights].

ss:Data.Font: 您可以使用％[vehicle_driver：v_lights]打开和关闭车灯。
用％
[vehicle_driver
v_horn]
车的喇叭。

Cell.Data: Start a fully equipped vehicle with %[vehicle_driver:v_start]. You need to have all the required parts in the vehicle's inventory for the engine to start!

ss:Data.Font: 使用％
[vehicle_driver
v_start]
启动装备齐全的车辆。您需要在车辆库存中包含所有必需的配件才能启动发动机！

Cell.Data: Be aware that survivors very close to you can listen in to your radio communication (same distance as whisper).

ss:Data.Font: 请注意，离你很近的幸存者可以收听你的无线电通讯（与私密距离相同）

Cell.Data: isn't just another radio, it includes a geiger counter, clock, thermometer, compass and GPS for orienteering which can be switched to using %[player:firemode].

ss:Data.Font: 对讲机不仅仅是另一个收音机，它包括一个盖革计数器，时钟，温度计，指南针和定向越野
GPS
，可以切换到使用％
[player
firemode]

Cell.Data: The Survivotron radio supports multiple channels and frequency bands, press %[default:radio_chup] for channel up, %[default:radio_chdn] for channel down and %[default:radio_band] to switch band.

ss:Data.Font: 对讲机无线电支持多个频道和频段，按％
[default
radio_chup]
进行频道向上，按％
[default
radio_chdn]
进行频道向下，按％
[default
radio_band]
进行频道切换。

Cell.Data: Miscreated supports head tracking devices using either TrackIR or Freetrack.

ss:Data.Font: Miscreated支持使用TrackIR或Freetrack的头部跟踪设备。

Cell.Data: Miscreated additionally supports 3D-positional voice either using Mumble or the Teamspeak CrossTalk-Plugin.

ss:Data.Font: Miscreated还使用Mumble或Teamspeak CrossTalk-Plugin支持3D位置语音。

Cell.Data: When picking up items, you can either scroll the mouse wheel to open the context menu, or just press %[player:use].

ss:Data.Font: 拾取物品时，您可以滚动鼠标滚轮以打开上下文菜单，或者只按％
[player
use]

Cell.Data: As a survivor on Orca Island, you start with your bare hands %[player:primary], a flashlight %[player:secondary] and some stylish clothes.

ss:Data.Font: 作为奥卡岛上的幸存者，你从赤手空拳开始％
[player
primary]
，手电筒％
[player
secondary]
和一些时髦的衣服。

Cell.Data: You can use chat commands to query server information: !uptime !ping !restart !server !pop

ss:Data.Font: 您可以使用聊天命令查询服务器信息：！uptime！ping！restart！server！pop

Cell.Data: You can try to push and flip smaller vehicles through the mouse wheel context menu.

ss:Data.Font: 您可以尝试通过鼠标滚轮上下推动和翻转较小的车辆。

Cell.Data: You can rename your survivor and change gender through the main menu player setup, if you aren't alive on the server.

ss:Data.Font: 如果你没有在服务器上生存，你可以通过主菜单栏设置重命名你的幸存者并改变性别。

Cell.Data: Weapon accessories can be triggered faster by the bindings, lights %[player:accessory2], lasers %[player:accessory1] and headgear %[player:accessory3].

ss:Data.Font: 武器％
[player
accessory2]
，激光％
[player
accessory1]
和头饰％
[player
accessory3]
可以更快地触发武器配件。

Cell.Data: Attach a silencer to your weapon to make your shots harder to hear by both survivors and mutants.

ss:Data.Font: 在你的武器上安装一个消音器，使你的射击更难被幸存者和突变体听到。

Cell.Data: A crafted silencer won't survive many shots.

ss:Data.Font: 一个特制的消音器不会经受住很多枪击。

Cell.Data: Attach a foregrip to your weapon to reduce your recoil.

ss:Data.Font: 在你的武器上加一个前把手，以减少你的后坐力。

Cell.Data: Attach a bayonet to your weapon to increase its melee damage.

ss:Data.Font: 在你的武器上附加一把刺刀，以增加其近战伤害。

Cell.Data: To relax your fingers use the toggle keys for sprinting forward %[player:sprintforward_toggle] and aiming down sights %[player:zoom_toggle].

ss:Data.Font: 要放松手指，请使用向前冲刺的拨动键％
[player
sprintforward_toggle]
并瞄准目标％
[player
zoom_toggle]

Cell.Data: Unconscious survivors can be woken up faster with some salt. Make sure to bandage them first if they are bleeding.

ss:Data.Font: 无意识的幸存者可以用盐更快地被唤醒。如果出血，一定要先用绷带包扎。

Cell.Data: The gas mask, bandanas and dust mask can protect you from gas effects.

ss:Data.Font: 防毒面具，头巾和防尘面具可以保护您免受气体影响。

Cell.Data: Be careful when consuming alcohol, drinking too much can knock you out.

ss:Data.Font: 饮酒时要小心，喝太多会让你失望。

Cell.Data: To subdue survivors you can choose non-lethal options such as incapacitation and knocking them out.\nRelevant items include: Handcuffs, ropes, duct-tape, tranq-rifle and stun-baton

ss:Data.Font: 为了制服幸存者，你可以选择非致命的选择，比如丧失能力和击倒他们。相关的物品包括：手铐，绳索，管道胶带，麻醉枪和打晕

Cell.Data: To recover from effects of sickness or infection you need to consume Antibiotics.

ss:Data.Font: 要从疾病或感染的影响中恢复，您需要消耗抗生素。

Cell.Data: To recover from effects of torpidity faster you can consume Aspirin or Energy Drinks.

ss:Data.Font: 了更快地从昏迷中恢复，你可以吃阿司匹林或能量饮料。

Cell.Data: You can switch between first person and third person view by pressing %[player:thirdperson].

ss:Data.Font: 您可以按
F1
[player
thirdperson]
在第一人称视角和第三人称视角之间切换。

Cell.Data: You can cancel a charged throw or bow shot by pressing %[player:reload].

ss:Data.Font: 您可以按鼠标左键％
[player
reload]
取消投掷或弓箭发射。

Cell.Data: Show or hide the HUD with %[default:ui_toggle_hud].

ss:Data.Font: 使用％[default：ui_toggle_hud]显示或隐藏HUD。

Cell.Data: To play the guitar use the emotes while its equipped, it can also be used to melee attack %[player:special].

ss:Data.Font: 弹奏吉他时使用的是表情，它也可以用于近战攻击％[player：special]。

Cell.Data: When extreme weather is approaching equip protective clothing and seek shelter indoors, underwater, enclosed vehicles or best underground in bunkers, sewers or caves.

ss:Data.Font: 当极端天气接近时，穿上防护服并在室内，水下，封闭的车辆或在地下掩体，下水道或洞穴中寻找庇护所。

Cell.Data: When logging off near a base not owned by you or your clan you will be moved to a random map position.

ss:Data.Font: 在不属于您或您的小组的基地附近退出时，您将被移动到随机地图位置。

Cell.Data: You can use the Survivotron VI to check for item and environmental radiation with the built in geiger counter (which can also be muted).

ss:Data.Font: 您可以使用对讲机通过内置盖革计数器（也可以静音）检查物品和环境辐射。

Cell.Data: The Survivotron VI can be used to check the environmental temperature.

ss:Data.Font: 对讲机可用于检查环境温度。

Cell.Data: You can check item details in your inventory by hovering over them.

ss:Data.Font: 您可以通过将鼠标悬停在背包中的物品详细信息上来查看它。

Cell.Data: Anti-rad pills, anti-rad mushrooms or potassium-iodine pills help against radiation.

ss:Data.Font: 抗辐射药丸，抗辐射蘑菇或碘 - 钾药丸有助于防止辐射。

Cell.Data: Look out for traps that can be placed and hidden in the environment. Some of these traps can be reused and crafted.

ss:Data.Font: 留意可以放置并隐藏在环境中的陷阱。其中一些陷阱可以重复使用和制作。

Cell.Data: Some seasonal items are only craftable and findable for a limited time.

ss:Data.Font: 有些季节性物品只能在有限的时间内使用。

Cell.Data: When scavenging for items the action menu will appear with a scrollwheel icon if there are items found.

ss:Data.Font: 清理项目时，如果找到物品，则操作菜单将显示滚轮图标。

Cell.Data: Scavenge the world for amCoins to use the Amalgamated Kiosk.

ss:Data.Font: 在世界各地寻找金币使用信息亭。

Cell.Data: Some disposed Amalgamated Kiosks found in the world can be towed to your base with a vehicle.

ss:Data.Font: 世界上发现的一些处理过的混合式售货亭可以用车辆拖到你的基地。

Cell.Data: To store items in your base you can craft 4 small crates by default and 2 large ones once you find the storage guide. You can also use tents.

ss:Data.Font: 要在您的基地存储物品，您可以默认制作
个小箱子，一旦找到存储指南就可以制作
个大箱子。你也可以使用帐篷。

Cell.Data: Amalgamated Kiosks placed in your base can only be used by your clan members.

ss:Data.Font: 放置在您的基地的信息亭只能由您的部落成员使用。

Cell.Data: You can apply cosmetic skins to your items in the Amalgamated Kiosks.

ss:Data.Font: 您可以在使用混合式售货亭中为您的物品应用皮肤

Cell.Data: Find and visit the paint shop to apply vehicle skins.

ss:Data.Font: 查找并访问油漆车间以应用车辆皮肤。

Cell.Data: (Central-Servers) Tired of some cosmetic items? Trade them ingame or steam marketplace (Requires them to be repaired and deposited into the Amalgamated Kiosk).

ss:Data.Font: （中央服务器）厌倦了一些皮肤？交易他们的游戏或
STEAM
市场（需要将它们修复并存入）。

Cell.Data: (Central-Servers) Amalgamated Kiosks are linked with your personal Steam Inventory, items without a red border can be traded and sold in the marketplace.

ss:Data.Font: （中央服务器）合并的信息亭与您的
STEAM
库链接，没有红色边框的物品可以在市场上交易和销售。

Cell.Data: (Central-Servers) Use Amalgamated Kiosks as personal long-term storage for your items, depositing and withdrawing items costs in-game amCoins.

ss:Data.Font: （中央服务器）使用混合式售货亭作为您的物品的个人长期存储，存放和取消游戏中的金币物品成本。

Cell.Data: (Central-Servers) Visit Amalgamated Kiosks to transfer your items to other servers, depositing and withdrawing items costs in-game amCoins.

ss:Data.Font: （中央服务器）访问混合式售货亭将您的物品转移到其他服务器，存放和取出游戏中的金币物品费用。

Cell.Data: (Central-Servers) Survive extreme weather conditions such as radiation storms to be awarded special skins.

ss:Data.Font: （中央服务器）生存极端天气条件，如辐射风暴，可获得特殊皮肤。

Cell.Data: (Central-Servers) Drive your vehicle around a lot to be awarded skins for it.

ss:Data.Font: （中央服务器）驾驶你的车辆很多，以获得它的皮肤。

Cell.Data: Cosmetic skins are awarded randomly by Steam while playing the game.

ss:Data.Font: 在玩游戏时，
Steam
会随机发送皮肤。

Cell.Data: Building a base? No harvest tools yet? Fear not, you can harvest wood and metal by scavenging palettes, logs, metal piles, rusted motorcycles, satellite dishes and more.

ss:Data.Font: 建立基地？还没有工具？不用担心，你可以通过清理木板，原木，金属桩，生锈的摩托车，卫星天线等来收获木材和金属。

Cell.Data: Most gear can be broken down into repair kits and then used to repair your gear. You can combine repair kits to save space!

ss:Data.Font: 大多数齿轮可以分解为修理包，然后用于修理您的装备。您可以组合维修套件以节省空间！

Cell.Data: By using a bow or crossbow you can hunt in near silence to avoid attracting hostile wildlife, mutants, and other survivors. As an added bonus, you can craft your own selection of arrows and bolts!

ss:Data.Font: 通过使用弓或弩，您可以在近乎安静的情况下捕猎，以避免吸引敌对的野生动物，突变体和其他幸存者。作为额外的奖励，您可以制作自己的箭头和弩箭头选择！

Cell.Data: Don't pass up those rags! Rags are invaluable as they are used in the crafting of packs, arrows, bolts, ropes, Molotov cocktails, and as emergency bandage replacement.

ss:Data.Font: 不要放弃那些破布！碎布非常宝贵，因为它们用于制作包装，箭头，螺栓，绳索，莫洛托夫鸡尾酒以及紧急绷带更换。

Cell.Data: Don't tear up all your clothes, the nights and certain weather gets cold and you might freeze.

ss:Data.Font: 不要撕掉你所有的衣服，夜晚和某些天气变冷，你可能会发抖。

Cell.Data: Check your survivors overall environmental protection stats in the inventory, compare and repair gear to achieve the maximum protection for different situations.

ss:Data.Font: 检查你的幸存者的背包的，查看和修理装备，以达到最大程度的保护。

Cell.Data: Expect weapons, gear and ammo to be hidden, search everywhere and everything - every nook and cranny is a potential hiding spot for loot.

ss:Data.Font: 期待隐藏武器，装备和弹药，到处搜寻所有东西 - 每个角落和裂缝都是战利品的潜在藏身之处。

Cell.Data: Inspect consumables and fluid sources to find out about their negative effects.\n(Only with Suviotron's geiger counter turned on is the radiation in them detectable)

ss:Data.Font: 检查消耗品和流体源，了解它们的负面影响。（只有打开对讲机的盖革计数器才能检测到它们的辐射）

Cell.Data: An alternative to inspecting consumables is the inventory tooltip which will show more details.\n(Only with Suviotron's geiger counter turned on is the radiation in them detectable)

ss:Data.Font: 检查耗材的另一种方法是库存工具提示，它将显示更多细节。（只有打开对讲机的盖革计数器才能检测到它们的辐射）

Cell.Data: The Survivotron geiger counter can be used to check for radiation in consumables and fluid sources directly in the world.

ss:Data.Font: Survivotron
盖革计数器可用于直接检查世界范围内的消耗品和流体源中的辐射。

Cell.Data: To find uncontaminated consumables visit spots unaffected by the radiation storms such as basements, bunkers, caves and sewers.

ss:Data.Font: 要查找未受污染的消耗品，请访问不受地下室，掩体，洞穴和下水道等辐射风暴影响的地点。

Cell.Data: Hungry? Plant vegetables or hunt animals then cook or grill them using fire pits, campfires, BBQ grills, ovens and microwaves.

ss:Data.Font: 饥饿？种植蔬菜或捕猎动物，然后使用火坑，篝火，烧烤架，烤箱和微波炉烹饪或烧烤。

Cell.Data: Freezing? Find and use fire pits, campfires, candles, burning barrels and cars to warm up.\nAlternatively stay in shelter inside or underground.

ss:Data.Font: 冷冻？找到并使用火坑，篝火，蜡烛，燃烧桶和汽车进行预热。或者留在室内或地下的避难所。

Cell.Data: To light a fire you require a fire starter, such as matches or a lighter.

ss:Data.Font: 要点燃火，你需要一个火焰启动器，如火柴或打火机。

Cell.Data: Freezing? Power up generators for houses and heat up their inside by powering up ovens, lights and microwaves.

ss:Data.Font: 非常冷？给房子的发电机供电，通过给烤箱、灯和微波炉供电来加热室内让你更加温暖。

Cell.Data: Freezing? Stay inside your base and use propane heaters and other heat sources like purifiers and work lights.

ss:Data.Font: 非常冷的？呆在你的基地内，使用煤气罐加热器和其他热源，如净化器和工作灯。

Cell.Data: Freezing? Find and use heat packs. Stay out of water and rain to keep dry.

ss:Data.Font: 非常冷的？找到并使用热包。远离水和雨水保持干燥。

Cell.Data: Sitting next to a campfire will boost your health regen even further.

ss:Data.Font: 坐在篝火旁会进一步促进你的健康恢复。

Cell.Data: Overheating? Leave the immediate area of the heat source and go for a swim to cool down.

ss:Data.Font: 过热？离开热源的附近区域，去游泳降温。

Cell.Data: Almost full? Partially consume items to preserve something for later and to avoid overeating.

ss:Data.Font: 快吃饱了？部分消耗物品储备起来方便日后食用，避免过量食用。

Cell.Data: When eating or drinking too much you will vomit and lose most of your food.

ss:Data.Font: 当你吃或喝得太多时，你会呕吐并失去大部分食物。

Cell.Data: Sirens and church bells announce approaching extreme weather conditions. When you hear them seek shelter.

ss:Data.Font: 警报和教堂钟声宣布接近极端天气条件。当你听到他们需要去寻求庇护

Cell.Data: While it is snowing a dangerous blizzard may occur and it can be detrimental to your health if you don't seek shelter and warm up.

ss:Data.Font: 当下雪的时候，可能会发生一场危险的暴风雪，如果你不寻求庇护所和热身，可能对你的健康有害。

Cell.Data: Taking damage from rain? If you see yellow smog then it is acid rain. Equip appropriate gear or seek shelter.

ss:Data.Font: 在雨中受伤？如果你看到黄色的烟雾，那就是酸雨。配备适当的装备或寻求庇护。

Cell.Data: Use water purification tablets to purify dirty water in your refillable containers.

ss:Data.Font: 使用净水片来净化你的可再填充容器中的脏水。

Cell.Data: Collect water in your base from rain with the water collector.

ss:Data.Font: 用集水器收集雨水中的水分。

Cell.Data: Only finding contaminated water? Purify water in your base with the water purifier.

ss:Data.Font: 只找到受污染的水？用净水器净化你基地的水。

Cell.Data: Store water in your base using the water barrels or camping jugs.

ss:Data.Font: 使用水桶或野营壶将水储存在你的基地。

Cell.Data: Some doors can be reinforced giving them more health.

ss:Data.Font: 有些门可以加固，使它们更坚固。

Cell.Data: Some doors you can pull open. You can also knock on doors before entering.

ss:Data.Font: 有些门你可以打开。你也可以在进门前敲门。

Cell.Data: Want to play purely against the environment, or alone? Host your own dedicated server.\nVarious settings exist to modify the experience to your preferences.

ss:Data.Font: 想纯粹对抗环境，还是独自一人？托管您自己的专用服务器。存在多种设置，可以根据您的喜好修改体验。

Cell.Data: Find and visit the hospital to stock up on medical items.

ss:Data.Font: 找到并参观医院以储备医疗用品。

Cell.Data: Visit and gain entry to big bunker complexes hidden on the island.\nLoot the iron-sons stashes for high-quality loot.

ss:Data.Font: 参观并进入隐藏在岛上的大型掩体建筑群。藏匿起来，以获得高质量的战利品。
报错

Cell.Data: Use the decontamination showers in the world to rid yourself from radiation effects.

ss:Data.Font: 使用世界上的净化淋浴器来消除辐射影响。

Cell.Data: You can farm different vegetables from the seed in planters, fill them with dirt, water, seeds and fertilizer for ideal growing conditions.

ss:Data.Font: 你可以在播种机里种植不同于种子的蔬菜，用泥土、水、种子和肥料填满它们，以获得理想的生长条件。

Cell.Data: To improve your farming efficiency further you can light your planters at night or heat them just enough to counter snow and cold nights.

ss:Data.Font: 为了进一步提高你的耕作效率，你可以在晚上点燃你的播种机，或者把它们加热到足以抵御雪和寒冷的夜晚。

Cell.Data: Gather the ripe vegetables from your planters before they rot.

ss:Data.Font: 在蔬菜腐烂之前，把它们从你的种植园里收集起来。

Cell.Data: You can use rotten food as fertilizer or some as a seed source.

ss:Data.Font: 你可以用腐烂的食物作为肥料或一些作为种子来源。

Cell.Data: When interacting with objects an icon is displayed: Scroll down to see what's in it.

ss:Data.Font: 当与对象交互时，会显示一个图标：向下滚动查看其中的内容。

Cell.Data: You can use rotten vegetables and fruits to poison water containers.

ss:Data.Font: 你可以用腐烂的蔬菜和水果来毒害水中的污染物。
